CustomField.formula:
TRIM( IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Revision Needed"), IMAGE("/resource/Red_Orange", "Revision Needed", 30, 30) & " Revision Needed ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Keep Same Info"), IMAGE("/resource/Green", "Keep Same Info", 30, 30) & " Keep Same Info ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Contract Created"), IMAGE("/resource/Purple", "Contract Created", 30, 30) & " Contract Created ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Contract Approved"), IMAGE("/resource/Dark_Purple", "Contract Approved", 30, 30) & " Contract Approved ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Hot Lead"), IMAGE("/resource/Red", "Hot Lead", 30, 30) & " Hot Lead ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Need More Info"), IMAGE("/resource/Orange", "Need More Info", 30, 30) & " Need More Info ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Cold Lead"), IMAGE("/resource/Blue", "Cold Lead", 30, 30) & " Cold Lead ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Warm Lead"), IMAGE("/resource/Pink", "Warm Lead", 30, 30) & " Warm Lead ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Assumptive Lead"), IMAGE("/resource/Grey", "Assumptive Lead", 30, 30) & " Assumptive Lead ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Sales Form Lead"), IMAGE("/resource/Dark_Purple", "Sales Form Lead", 30, 30) & " Sales Form Lead ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "On Hold"), IMAGE("/resource/Hard_Blue", "On Hold", 30, 30) & " On Hold", "") & TRIM( IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Marijana to do"), IMAGE("/resource/Black", "Marijana to do", 30, 30) & " Marijana to do ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Natasa to do"), IMAGE("/resource/Black", "Natasa to do", 30, 30) & " Natasa to do ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Rania to do"), IMAGE("/resource/Black", "Rania to do", 30, 30) & " Rania to do ", "") &
IF(INCLUDES(Label__c, "Goran to do"), IMAGE("/resource/Black", "Goran to do", 30, 30) & " Goran to do ", "")) )
CustomField.label: Colored Labels
